sentence.Network_en: They seemed devoted to each other and were openly affectionate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们看起来非常恩爱，柔情蜜意溢于言表。

sentence.Network_en: This collection of letters is affectionate, candid and wickedly funny.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书信集感情真挚，语言坦率，还透着一种顽皮的滑稽。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'disposed, inclined towards'): from French affectionné 'beloved' or medieval Latin affectionatus 'devoted', from affectio(n-), from afficere 'to influence' (see affect)

entry.tran: 充满深情的；满怀柔情的；表示爱的
entry.def: If you are affectionate, you show your love or fondness for another person in the way that you behave towards them.

example.ex: They seemed devoted to each other and were openly affectionate...
example.tran: 他们看起来非常恩爱，柔情蜜意溢于言表。

example.ex: She gave me a very long and affectionate hug.
example.tran: 她满怀深情地久久拥抱了我。

means.word_mean: 1. having or displaying warmth or affection;

auth_sentence.content: Roddy delivered an affectionate thump on Danus' shoulder.
auth_sentence.res_content: Roddy delivered an affectionate thump on Danus' shoulder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Roddy delivered an affectionate thump on Danus' shoulder.

auth_sentence.content: Then he would give his horse an affectionate pat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then he would give his horse an affectionate pat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then he would give his horse an affectionate pat.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传染的,传染性的,有感染力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infect传染+ious……的→adj.传染的,传染性的,有感染力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

stems_affixes.value_cn: 糖果制造人, 糖果店
stems_affixes.word_buile: confection[n.甜食,糖果]+ery场所→n.糖果制造人, 糖果店
de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的

means.word_mean: 慈爱的,充满深情的,温柔亲切的,表示关爱的

sentences.cn: 你的亲爱的(英美人写家信时结尾用语)

sentences.en: She is an affectionate child and loves to be hugged and kissed.
sentences.cn: 她是一个多情的孩子，喜欢让人爱抚亲吻。

sentences.en: He gave her an affectionate kiss.
sentences.cn: 他给了她一个深情的吻。

sentences.en: He gave her an affectionate squeeze.
His face took on an affectionate glow.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上洋溢着热情的红光。

sentences.en: She took affectionate leave of her mother.
Although she was intimidating in aspect,she was warm and affectionate beneath the surface.
sentences.cn: 虽然她外表令人畏惧,但内心却温暖仁爱。
